price: Ata kanë marrë zota, në vend të Allahut, për t’i pasur ndihmës.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
